house_listing.comments: Property included barn-style home, horse barn/tackroom, and large aluminum building w/concrete floor. Highway frontage and driveway landscaped with poplar trees. Excellent family homestead with close proximity to town.

for_more_information_contact.firm_name: Windermere Real Estate/ Sun Valley, LLC
